channel.title: Monster spawning problem
channel.description:
Whenever I add a new Silabs monster I get this when i run my server. Then i cant log into the server. How can I add them?
I tried spawning NPCid 4980 which is brutal green dragon. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Array IndexOutOfBoundsException: 4980 at NPCHandler.newNPC(NPCHandler.java:1382) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1132) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:428) at server.main(server.java:97)[/code]
I'm using a Devolution(Dodian) base server. Silabs.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 06:25:18 PM[/size][hr]no help =(

item.title: Monster spawning problem
item.dc:creator: @bloodymouth bloodymouth
item.description:
@bloodymouth wrote:

Whenever I add a new Silabs monster I get this when i run my server. Then i cant log into the server. How can I add them?
